title: The Pleasure is mutual
creator_credit: Joanna Foster, William D Stoneback and Connecticut Films Inc
brief_description: This exceptional film covers the goals of picture book programs, general planning, specific criteria for selection of good books suitable for varying age levels, methods of preparing for the session, and the techniques of group control. All aspects of the subject from broad theory to precise details about technique are covered in this filmed record of story book sessions in day care centre and libraries in the New York region.
